li.label: zealous
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} passionately follows {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, causing the words of other beliefs to have little effect on {PAWN_objective} and {PAWN_pronoun} will have much better luck when attempting to enlighten others.

li.label: devout
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} follows {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion closely, and {PAWN_pronoun} will resist conversion attempts while being more successful with {PAWN_possessive} own.

li.label: cynical
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has little faith in ideoligions, causing {PAWN_objective} to commonly switch {PAWN_possessive} beliefs when forced to and be much less persuasive when trying to convert others.
